  • From Zero to Hero: Coding a blog in Jekyll - Sep 26, 2019

    learning tech-tutorials jekyll

    I’ve been asked quite a few times online for help on creating static sites with generators like jekyll and what are the best ways to host them. So, I have decided to write a series of blog posts that will detail how to fully create, setup and deploy your own static blog built with Jekyll. We will use a customizable theme and for hosting, we’ll go with Netlify’s free tier.
